creator: fikrat@gmail.com
text: Hi. I have a problem but i cannt resolve it yet i have a one script to compile a java source but it is always warning. and i use in the ant script nowarn options in javac command but it doesn't works. I use for this problem ant1.8.1 version it doesn't worked yet

Please use the user ailing list for questions.

In addition, you are not providing enough information for anybody to help you, so do yourself a favor and at least include the warnings you see when posting to the user list.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
fikrat@gmail.com
peterreilly@apache.org
text:
The problem here is javac, it does not allow suppression
of this particular warning. There is nothing (i.e. no command
line arg to javac) ant can
do to suppress the warning.

Peter
